sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SIALKOT, the capital and administrative headquarters of the above district, is situated in 32° 31' N. lat. and 74° 36' E. long., on the northern bank of the Aik torrent. It is an extensive city with handsome and well-built streets, and contains several shrines and buildings of historical interest. In 1881 its population was 39,613.
